title: Lauren Is Explorin’
description: Lauren is explorin’ and invites you to explore things like colors, places, and sounds
quote: Red, red, red, things are red.
altHero: a cartoon girl Lauren, young and white with pigtails, overalls, and a fanny pack
alt1: Lauren walking down a nature path
alt3: Lauren’s head floating over a couple apples
alt4: Lauren in front of a red barn
